TopicTitle: Time-Traveler Rocket Builder Agent From Another Dimension Ready For Duty!

Articles.Content:
Hello Mates!

My name is "Vittor" but you can call me "Wolf", i've been playing KSP for some time, i'm playing this game since v0.18, but now we are at v0.22, what is cool. I'm from Brazil, that's why my name sounds strange, and that's why i might write a word wrong here. I was looking at the forums, then I thought "WHY I DON'T MAKE A POST HERE?" so that's what i just did c:

I'm not a Novice, but i'm not a PRO, so, can you guys give me some tips about the game? I'm not that good ya know, last time I tried to land on Minmus, I didn't planned the maneuver very well, so my all my fuel got empty and i got past Minmus and i ended crashing at Eve with Jebediah, i was lucky, because i was with some parachutes equipped, but the rocket ended in the "ocean" so only the command capsule survived :c Now i need to send a rescue mission...

So, that's all, see you guys, in space!

Greetings! And good luck with helping Jeb out at Eve. I don't have the full version, but from what info I heard, better train for a Minmus landing, because you'll need to get there to get Kethane, the only fuel that works at Eve.

Greetings! And good luck with helping Jeb out at Eve. I don't have the full version, but from what info I heard, better train for a Minmus landing, because you'll need to get there to get Kethane, the only fuel that works at Eve.

Thanks Mate! Good luck for ya to get your Full Version c:
Kethane is found on all planets and you won't need kethane for Eve, since you just convert it into normal fuel and it isn't stock.

Kethane is found on all planets and you won't need kethane for Eve, since you just convert it into normal fuel and it isn't stock.

Thanks redjoker, for the tip c:
Welcome to the forum, unless you're from the 8th dimension, 'cause those guys are all kinds of trouble.

Welcome to the forum, unless you're from the 8th dimension, 'cause those guys are all kinds of trouble.

XD, Thanks anyway, and no, i'm front the 10th dimension, tons of crazy thing here. It's like the "MAD"/Alfred E. Newman house.
